desmoj.extensions.visualEvents

Class MoveEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • desmoj.extensions.visualEvents.VisualEvent
        • desmoj.extensions.visualEvents.MoveEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MoveEvent
extends VisualEvent
    The MoveEvent indicates the event when a SpatialObject is be moving or a new position is set. It could be received by visualizing instances or animation recording instances.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • MoveEvent

        public MoveEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                 java.lang.String moverName,
                 Movement movement,
                 boolean focusOnTrack,
                 javax.vecmath.Vector3d frontSideVec,
                 TimeInstant occurredTime)
        Constructs a MoveEvent.
        Parameters:
        source - The object on which the event initially occurred.
        moverName - The name of the object who's moving.
        movement - The movement which should be performed.
        frontSideVec - The front side vector if the focusOnTrack is on.
        occuredTime - The TimeInstant when the event occurred.

      • isFocusedOnTrack

        public boolean isFocusedOnTrack()
        Shows whether the moving object should focus on the track while performing the movement.
        Returns:
        true, if it should focus on the track.
